body_html:
@rohan100jain @danmane - tf.substr has been merged, and I've update this Op to utilize it. There are a few things left to do, but the main functionality of the op is here. Left to do:

  • More/better documentation
  • More tests (should we test with small jpeg/png/gif files in addition to hard-coding in bytes?)
  • Tests for gifs

body:
@rohan100jain @danmane - `tf.substr` has been merged, and I've update this Op to utilize it. There are a few things left to do, but the main functionality of the op is here. Left to do:
- More/better documentation
- More tests (should we test with small jpeg/png/gif files in addition to hard-coding in bytes?)
- Tests for gifs
